transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Ha Digvijay ji kaise hain sir? Pravesh bol raha hu IndiaMART se.
Customer: Ji bataye.
Executive: Sir badhiya. Sir ho kya raha hai scam se aa rahe hai sir aap ye batao pehle. Matlab kya hua? 
Customer: Call karta hai illegal dawai mangta hai illegal hai. 
Executive: Hmm hmm hmm.
Customer: Aur complaint karo to us hisab se baat bhi nahi karte. Thik hai sir mai complaint note down karke inki ID deactivate. India India wale buyer ya bahar wale?
Executive: India ke buyer the.
Customer: Bahar ke buyer se scam nahi hote.
Executive: India wale.
Executive: Achha.
Customer: Bolte hai ki matlab bina prescription ke mere ko bhej do yahi bolte hai na?
Executive: Bina prescription ke nahi bina drug license ke unko pata nahi kaise log khol ke baithe hue hai kya hai logo ka bina drug license ke unko dawa chahiye.
Executive: Achha.
Customer: To mai to recorded line pe rehta hu to log baat bhi nahi karte fir kaat dete hai.
Executive: Buyer wo dawa chahiye bina.
Customer: Hmm.
Customer: Bina prescription ke bina drug license ke bina GST ke.
Customer: Ab jaise man lijiye dawa to teen hi log le sakte hai ya to wholesaler ya to retailer ya to customer. Customer hoga to prescription ke bina le nahi sakta.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Hmm.
Customer: Abhi bina prescription me to ladke mar gaye Kanpur me.
Executive: Ha.
Customer: Wo syrup pee liye the.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Sir aap jab mana kar deta hu ki matlab nahi dete hai bhai. Mai mana kar deta hu lekin bar bar alag alag jagah se call aata hai to mai bhi frustrated hoke complaint karunga na bhai.
Executive: Ha.
Customer: To mai bas usi ke liye call kiya. Dekhiye na buyer ko jab hai na control karna thoda aapko jyada kyuki bahut tarah ke scammer ke sab bata rahe ho na.
Executive: Sahi baat hai ki matlab hai matlab mangte honge mai manta hu is baat ko.
Executive: Dekhiye achha buyer ko bas itna kar sakte hai block kar sakte hai hum. Aap bhi kar sakte hai.
Customer: To mai isliye nahi ki mai block kar sakta hu. Hai hai hai hai hai.
Executive: Hai option. Hai to mai block kar deta hu abhi abhi aapke paas. Ha aapke paas. Mai bata mai batata hu. Abhi mai app open kar raha hu. On call pe hash lagaiye.
Executive: Hash one daal ke sidhe block mariye.
Executive: Hai sir one press kar denge sidhe block ho jayega wo. Aayega bhi nahi buyer ab.
Customer: Hai sir. Ab jaise maine uski profile khol li abhi to ye buyer ne apna naam. Uski profile pe hash one dial karna padega.
Customer: Niche likhe hash one.
Executive: Nahi nahi jab call jaise aayegi na kisi buyer ki is tarike ki. Ha.
Customer: On call pe hai sidhe hash one daliye. Ha press kijiye uske baad sidhe block kabhi nahi aayega.
Executive: Sir sidhe block ho jayega wo. Thik hai.
Customer: Yahi kar lijiyega bahut aasan hai isme hai na jo bhi hai. Thik thik thik. Thik hai mai aapko le leta hu matlab sir aap directly call kiye humko waha se 96 me dekh rahe hai number se.
Executive: Are hum kya kare directly kya pichli bar aisa issue. Humko aisa lag raha hai jaise hum bahut dur ho gaye hai aapse aap humko ja mil ke gaye galat matlab hum samajh nahi pa rahe hai is cheez ko. Aap to mere ko whatsapp bol ke team call kara dete abhi arrange. Matlab yaha sab koi janta hai aapko sir.
Executive: Customer ke aapko janta bhi nahi hai sir.
Customer: Jante to hum hi log hai. Hum chehre se jante hai aap chehre se jante hai sir. Aap message kar dete to hum bata dete.
Customer: Ab hume pata hai jab waha aap jate ho na uske baad ek ghanta baad do ghanta baad pata nahi aapki availability hai ki nahi hai. Fir ke pata bhi nahi chalta kya hua hai matter kya hai hai na.
Customer: To aage resolution hum hi ko dena hai hai na.
Customer: Koshish kijiye ki matlab whatsapp bhi kar denge to resolve kar denge samajh rahe hai.
Customer: Thik hai Digvijay ji.
Executive: Thik hai to ye nahi nahi. Hello. Kya keh rahe hai?
Customer: Keh raha hu to thik hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Receiving scam calls asking for illegal medicines.

- Issues with complaint resolution process.

- Buyers asking for medicines without prescription/license.



Resolution:

- Executive explained how to block buyers.

- Explained to press #1 to block the buyer.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- scam calls, blocking, prescription, drug license
